content.rendered:
Date: Sunday 2 October 2022
Location: London
Registration fee: £200
Sponsorship target: £2,000

All our places on Team Hope are now filled. If you would like to run the marathon next year (2023) please complete the below form to be included on the waiting list and we’ll be in touch. Don’t forget though to enter the ballot too to increase your chances of taking part.

If you have a ballot place and would like to fundraise for us and be part of Team Hope, please let us know by emailing Catherine at fundraising@hopeandhomes.org

Register your interest

Register your interest in running with us in the TCS London Marathon in 2023 by filling in the form below:
Name(Required)
This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.

.

excerpt.rendered: Sign up for the run of your life and take on the world famous TCS London Marathon as part of Team Hope, helping to keep families together for the long-run.
